item.title: 15 Most Expensive Movies Ever Made
item.description: In the past decade or so, movie budgets have soared to unprecedented heights. There are now plenty of movies which cost over $300 million.

item.title: Alien: Earth - Cast, Story, Trailer & Everything We Know About FX's Alien TV Show
item.description: The Alien franchise is heading to television for the first time thanks to FX. Here's everything we know about the new TV series so far.

item.title: 10 Movies That No One Expected To Become Broadway Shows
item.description: While there is some level of expectations that musicals could turn into Broadway shows, some dramas and comedies have also made the jump.
